title: 820-2850 GPU disabling
message:
Good morning, does anyone have the method to disable the GPU of macbook pro 15 2010 ?  
I do the software part, when you do the hardware part that takes the power from the GPU r8911 controller chip, the mac stays on and off.

title: 820-2850 GPU disabling
message:

Use search function...

message: Removal of r8911 will not work for 2010.
